## Mission

Add new dashboard widgets and enhance data visualization.

## Branch

`claude/wave3/dashboard-enhance`

## Scope

- New widget components
- Interactive charts
- Customizable dashboard layout
- Quick actions panel

## Features

1. Pipeline value chart
2. Opportunity funnel
3. Deadline calendar widget
4. Activity feed widget
5. Quick stats cards

## Output

`docs/WAVE3_DASHBOARD_ENHANCE_COMPLETE.md`
